title: Ep193: Ropes, a Muse and Electro-Play (Ft. Dallas playhouse)
itunes:title: Ep193: Ropes, a Muse and Electro-Play (Ft. Dallas playhouse)
description:
This week Mandii & Weezy are joined by Dallas Playhouse, a rope muse and webcam model. The conversation begins with if “kink runs in the family” as the girls are reminded that Dallas’ sister was the muse for the Philadelphia Live Show with Dash. Somehow this conversation leads to a kink we have yet to dig into- electroplay!! This week’s Vanilla Sh-t discusses the myth of sex making your butt bigger. Any truth to it? Did you know that talking about sex improves your sex life? We discuss it this week in the Heaux Fax segment.



Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!


Want more? Bonus episodes, merch and more Whoreible Decisions!! Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
